title: Dream Theater - Live at Luna Park (2013) [Blu-ray]
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                        Dream Theater - Live at Luna Park (2013)
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: Dream Theater
 Line-up: James LaBrie - vocals
          John Petrucci - guitar
          John Myung - bass, chapman stick
          Jordan Rudess - keyboards, Continuum, harpejji, iOS devices
          Mike Mangini - drums, percussion       
 Title: Live at Luna Park
 Genre: Progressive Metal
 Label: Eagle Rock Entertainment / Eagle Vision
 Released: 2013
 Recorded: August 19 & August 20, 2012 (Luna Park Stadium, Buenos Aires, Argentina)
 Artists Country: US
 Format: Blu-ray video

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 BD specs:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Video: 
 MPEG-4 AVC / 16999 kbps / 1920*1080i / 29,970 fps / 16:9 / High Profile 4.1
 
 Audio:
 A1: English DTS-HD MA 5.1 / 48 kHz / 3413 kbps / 24-bit 
     (DTS Core: 5.1 / 48 kHz / 1509 kbps / 24-bit)  
 A2: English LPCM 2.0 / 48 kHz / 1536 kbps / 16-bit
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 01 - Bridges in the Sky

 11 - Outcry

 13 - Surrounded 
 14 - On the Backs of Angels

 16 - The Test That Stumped Them All

 01 - These Walls (1080i; 7:08)
